nodes.description: 1984年9月，黑手党线人Tommaso Buscetta的证词引发了对西西里黑手党的调查和逮捕令。
nodes.support_text: ...the testimony of the Mafia turncoat Tommaso Buscetta to Antimafia prosecutor Giovanni Falcone had led to a series of arrest warrants in September 1984 that subsequently would lead to the Maxi Trial against 475 Mafia defendants.

nodes.description: 1984年12月23日，一枚炸弹在佛罗伦萨火车站被放置在904次列车的行李架上。
nodes.support_text: The bomb had been placed on a luggage rack whilst the train was in Florence Santa Maria Novella railway station.

nodes.description: 当晚19:08，列车在亚平宁隧道内高速行驶时，炸弹被遥控引爆。
nodes.support_text: At 19:08 a bomb exploded in the ninth car, a 2nd class coach in the middle of the train. The train was 8 kilometers into the Apennine Base Tunnel... and was travelling at 150 km/h.

nodes.description: 爆炸导致16人死亡，266人受伤，列车在紧急制动后停在隧道内。
nodes.support_text: A bomb on the 904 express train (Rapido 904) from Naples to Milan was detonated, killing 16 and wounding 266... The emergency brake was pulled, and the train came to a stop a thousand or so meters from the blast...

nodes.description: 受伤的列车长设法通过服务电话呼叫求助，启动了应急响应。
nodes.support_text: Train conductor Gian Claudio Bianconcini – on his last journey before retiring – was wounded in the nape of his neck, but managed to reach a service telephone and call for help.

nodes.description: 救援人员因浓烟和通信困难受阻，一个半小时后才抵达现场。
nodes.support_text: Rescuers encountered problems reaching the disaster scene. Rescue vehicles gathered at the southern entrance of the tunnel, but were blocked by thick smoke emerging from it. After an hour and a half the first service vehicles dispatched to the scene could reach the stricken train...

nodes.description: 救援列车被用作救护车，分批次将伤者和未受伤乘客疏散出隧道。
nodes.support_text: Coaches of a rescue train were used as ambulances, ferrying the injured and taking them to San Benedetto Val di Sambro station.

nodes.description: 爆炸后数小时内，多个左右翼组织声称负责，调查初期怀疑为新法西斯主义者。
nodes.support_text: 文本片段未在提供的原始文本中找到

nodes.description: 一名目击者称看到两人在佛罗伦萨车站将袋子放上行李架，为调查提供了关键线索。
nodes.support_text: 文本片段未在提供的原始文本中找到

nodes.description: 1985年3月，黑手党头目Giuseppe Calò和Guido Cercola因其他罪名被捕。

nodes.description: 1985年5月11日，在Calò的藏身处发现了与爆炸案相同的炸药和引爆装置。

nodes.description: 1986年1月9日，检察官正式指控Calò和Cercola策划了此次爆炸案。
nodes.support_text: 文本片段未在提供的原始文本中找到

nodes.description: 1989年2月25日，佛罗伦萨法院判处Calò和Cercola无期徒刑。
nodes.support_text: Mafia boss Giuseppe Calò, also known as "Pippo", was convicted for ordering and organising the attack in February 1989.

nodes.description: 1991年3月5日，意大利最高法院出人意料地撤销了判决，下令重审。
nodes.support_text: 文本片段未在提供的原始文本中找到

nodes.description: 1992年11月24日，最高法院最终确认了Calò等人的有罪判决，认定黑手党是幕后主使。
nodes.support_text: 文本片段未在提供的原始文本中找到

nodes.description: 2011年4月27日，黑手党“教父”Salvatore Riina因被指控是爆炸案的幕后主谋而被下令拘留。
nodes.support_text: In April 2011 Mafia "boss of bosses" Salvatore Riina was indicted for ordering the bombing.

nodes.description: 袭击者企图通过炸弹袭击分散意大利安全部队的注意力。
nodes.support_text: The motive behind the bomb attack was to distract Italian security forces from investigating the Sicilian Mafia after the testimony of the Mafia turncoat Tommaso Buscetta...
